actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to appropriate to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund the amount of certain rents, royalties, and other sums deposited in the Treasury of the United States pursuant to the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Acts.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to appropriate to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund all rents, royalties, and other sums deposited in the U.S. Treasury pursuant to the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act minus any amount credited to the Land and Water Conservation fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to appropriate to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund the amount of certain rents, royalties, and other sums deposited in the Treasury of the United States pursuant to the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Acts.
